name: listSchema
query:
SELECT *
FROM ALL_USERS
WHERE
    USERNAME NOT IN ('SYS', 'SYSTEM', 'SYSMAN', 'OUTLN', 'DBSNMP', 'CTXSYS', 'MDSYS', 'ORDSYS', 'WMSYS', 'XDB', 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER')
    AND USERNAME NOT LIKE 'APEX_%' AND USERNAME NOT LIKE 'AUDSYS'
    AND USERNAME NOT LIKE 'GSM_%' AND USERNAME NOT LIKE 'SYS%'
    AND USERNAME NOT LIKE 'PDBADMIN' AND USERNAME NOT LIKE 'ANONYMOUS'
    AND USERNAME NOT LIKE 'APPQOSSYS' AND USERNAME NOT LIKE 'GGADMIN'
    AND USERNAME NOT LIKE 'GGSYS' AND USERNAME NOT LIKE 'DVF'
    AND USERNAME NOT LIKE 'DVSYS' AND USERNAME NOT LIKE 'DIP'
    AND USERNAME NOT LIKE 'BVMERP' AND USERNAME NOT LIKE 'DBSFWUSER'
    AND USERNAME NOT LIKE 'LBACSYS' AND USERNAME NOT LIKE 'MDDATA'
    AND USERNAME NOT LIKE 'REMOTE_SCHEDULER_AGENT' AND USERNAME NOT LIKE 'XS$NULL'
    AND USERNAME NOT LIKE 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA'
ORDER BY USERNAME
FETCH FIRST 500 ROWS ONLY

name: HIENDIEN_NOITRU
query:
select 
  0 as goidv, 
  nvl(e.tenvt, e.tenkp) as khoa, 
  a.mabn, 
  b.hoten, 
  case when b.phai = 0 then 'Nam' else 'Nữ' end as phai, 
  to_char(b.ngaysinh, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as ngaysinh, 
  b.namsinh, 
  to_char(a.ngay, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') as ngay, 
  nvl(c.tenvt, c.tenkp) as tenkp, 
  f.doituong, 
  nvl(g.sothe, ' ') as sothe, 
  case when h.ma is not null then p.ten || ';' || cast(
    h.ma as nvarchar2(50)
  )|| ';' || h.ten else cast(
    x.giuong as nvarchar2(254)
  ) end as magiuong, 
  p.ten as phong, 
  nvl(h.ma, x.giuong) as giuong, 
  h.ten as tengiuong, 
  cast(
    '' as nvarchar2(254)
  ) as chedochamsoc, 
  cast(
    '' as nvarchar2(2000)
  ) as dienbien, 
  a.id, 
  a.maql, 
  b.nam, 
  d.madoituong, 
  a.mavaovien, 
  trim(b.sonha)|| ' ' || trim(b.thon)|| ' ' || trim(z3.tenpxa)|| ', ' || trim(z2.tenquan)|| ', ' || z1.tentt as diachi, 
  b.cholam, 
  x.maicd, 
  x.chandoan, 
  '' as chandoankt, 
  '' as maicdkt, 
  nvl(g.traituyen, 0) as traituyen, 
  to_char(g.ngay1, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as ngay1, 
  to_char(g.ngay2, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as ngay2, 
  to_char(g.ngay3, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as ngay3, 
  x.mabs, 
  y.hoten as tenbs, 
  a.makp, 
  d.sovaovien, 
  to_char(d.ngay, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') as ngayvv, 
  w.tuoivao, 
  to_char(a.ngay, 'yymmddhh24:mi') as yymmdd, 
  nt.ten as tennhantu, 
  nn.tennn, 
  e.ngaytb, 
  trim(
    to_char(
      sysdate - x.ngay + decode(x.khoachuyen, '001', 1, 0), 
      '999999999'
    )
  ) as ngaydt, 
  substr(w.tuoivao, 1, 3)|| case when substr(w.tuoivao, 4, 1)= 0 then 'TU' else case when substr(w.tuoivao, 4, 1)= 1 then 'TH' else case when substr(w.tuoivao, 4, 1)= 2 then 'NG' else 'GI' end end end as tuoi, 
  nvl(g.mucluong, 0) as mucluong, 
  nvl(g.canbo, 0) as canbo, 
  cb.ten as tencanbo, 
  0 as bntra, 
  0 as stdatra, 
  0 as tamung, 
  0 as conlai, 
  tv.mabv, 
  tv.tenbv as noichuyenden, 
  noigt.maicd as icd_noichuyenden, 
  noigt.chandoan as cd_noichuyenden, 
  to_char(g.tungay, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as tungay, 
  to_char(g.denngay, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as denngay, 
  to_char(sysdate, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') as ngayrv, 
  dantoc.dantoc, 
  ' ' as nhapbenhan, 
  d.nhantu, 
  b.mann, 
  b.madantoc, 
  d.dentu, 
  dtu.ten as tendentu, 
  qg.ma as manuoc, 
  qg.ten as tennuoc, 
  b.sonha, 
  b.thon, 
  z3.tenpxa, 
  z2.tenquan, 
  z1.tentt, 
  b.matt, 
  b.maqu, 
  b.maphuongxa, 
  b.phai as gioitinh, 
  ' ' as trongngay, 
  0 as songaytheodoi, 
  ' ' as ngaytheodoi, 
  -1 as truyenmau, 
  0 as canhbaoxn, 
  -1 as duyet, 
  b.socmnd, 
  nvl(
    sodt.didong, 
    nvl(sodt.nha, sodt.coquan)
  ) as sodienthoai, 
  0 as trunghoten, 
  0 as cannangss, 
  0 as apgar1, 
  0 as apgar5, 
  0 as apgar10, 
  0 as thang, 
  0 as tuan, 
  '' as cachsanh, 
  '' as ngaysanh, 
  case when nvl(w.bhtn, 0)= 0 then cast(
    'Chờ phản hồi hồ sơ' as nvarchar2(254)
  ) else case when nvl(w.bhtn, 0)= 1 then cast(
    'Được bảo lãnh' as nvarchar2(254)
  ) else case when nvl(w.bhtn, 0)= 2 then cast(
    'Không được bảo lãnh' as nvarchar2(254)
  ) else null end end end as tinhtrang, 
  nvl(b1.hoten, bstd.hoten) as tenbsdt, 
  b2.ten as chamsocdt, 
  nvl(nktd.tinhtrang, 0) as tinhtrangtheodoi, 
  '' as tentinhtrang 
from 
  hsoftmat.hiendien a 
  inner join hsoftmat.btdbn b on a.mabn = b.mabn 
  inner join hsoftmat.btdkp_bv c on a.noichuyen = c.makp 
  inner join hsoftmat.benhandt d on a.maql = d.maql 
  inner join hsoftmat.btdkp_bv e on a.makp = e.makp 
  inner join hsoftmat.doituong f on d.madoituong = f.madoituong 
  left join hsoftmat.bhyt g on a.maql = g.maql 
  left join hsoftmat.dmgiuong h on a.idgiuong = h.id and h.hide = 0 
  left join hsoftmat.dmphong p on h.idphong = p.id 
  inner join hsoftmat.nhapkhoa x on a.id = x.id 
  left join hsoftmat.dmbs b1 on x.mabsdt = b1.ma 
  left join hsoftmat.ba_dmchedochamsoc b2 on case when x.chamsocdt = 0 then x.chamsoc else x.chamsocdt end = b2.id 
  left join hsoftmat.dmbs y on x.mabs = y.ma 
  left join hsoftmat.lienhe w on a.maql = w.maql 
  inner join hsoftmat.btdtt z1 on b.matt = z1.matt 
  inner join hsoftmat.btdquan z2 on b.maqu = z2.maqu 
  inner join hsoftmat.btdpxa z3 on b.maphuongxa = z3.maphuongxa 
  left join hsoftmat.nhantu nt on d.nhantu = nt.ma 
  left join hsoftmat.btdnn_bv nn on b.mann = nn.mann 
  left join hsoftmat.dmcanbo cb on g.canbo = cb.id 
  left join hsoftmat.noigioithieu noigt on d.maql = noigt.maql 
  left join hsoftmat.dstt tv on noigt.mabv = tv.mabv 
  left join hsoftmat.btddt dantoc on b.madantoc = dantoc.madantoc 
  left join hsoftmat.dentu dtu on d.dentu = dtu.ma 
  left join hsoftmat.nuocngoai nng on b.mabn = nng.mabn 
  left join hsoftmat.dmquocgia qg on nng.id_nuoc = qg.ma 
  left join hsoftmat.dienthoai sodt on b.mabn = sodt.mabn 
  left join hsoftmat.nhapkhoatheodoi nktd on x.id = nktd.id 
  left join hsoftmat.dmbs bstd on nktd.mabs = bstd.ma 
where d.loaiba = 1 and a.nhapkhoa = 1 and a.xuatkhoa = 0 and a.makp = '144' 
  and (g.sudung is null or g.sudung = 1) 
order by khoa,yymmdd desc
FETCH FIRST 200 ROWS ONLY
